lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Financial organization in the Community department. We run a peer lending program which I am involved in and support.

lenders.name: Carolyn

lenders.occupational_info: For years I practiced anesthesia (I put patients to sleep for surgery) but I am now mostly retired.  I recently traveled to Tanzania to help teach health care professionals about Palliative Care.  I learned as much from the participants as they did from the "teachers".

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I believe that to better the world we must give everyone a fair shot at supporting themselves and their societies. I hope some day to be helping those people more directly, but for now, I am more than happy to lend as much as I can. Best wishes to all!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I have so much compared to how little so many other women in the world have. I want to share what I have and help women prosper in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired in August 2007 as a consultant for the largest benefits consulting firm in the world, Mercer. My work there was very rewarding and now I have the opportunity for others to have the same experience.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Niki
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people direct access to funds to promote their well-being.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze environmental issues for large public infrastructure projects (roads, bridges, ports, parks) and document them in reports so that the public knows the environmental impacts associated with the project.

lenders.loan_because: My wife and I believe in giving people an opportunity to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student, working part time while going to school.

lenders.name: Fabio
lenders.loan_because: I know by experience how difficult things can be when you want to have a better live for yourself or your family and you know that you have the talet and you know in your soul that you can work hard to pursue it but at the same time you cannot find anyone to trust in you, to believe in you......sometimes people just need a little hand to stand up and change their lives and through Kiva i think this is my chance to give a hand to this people and hopefuly make their lives better.

lenders.name: jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I am able to at the time.

lenders.name: amy

lenders.occupational_info: I help my patients manage their pain and disability.

lenders.occupational_info: a labor of love

lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories to children, and I draw pictures to help tell those stories. I feel the best story ever told is the one not yet written.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance. I have been blessed enough that I have most of the things I need and in a position to help others. I feel that if most of the people out there are given a chance and resources they require, they would do a much better job than what I'm doing and would be able to change the world and make this place a much better one then what it is today..
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Insurance Broker working for a Lloyd's of London Broker. At the same time I also act as in-house Risk Manager for a large offshore Drilling Contractor

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.loan_because: The future of our society depends on what we do in the present.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I know the challenges facing people in rural areas and I like innovative ways of reaching between people. This is a way for me to see the impact on one individual, which isn't always so obvious with entire projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage programs for a NGO that implements health projects in northern Vietnam (Cao Bang Province).

lenders.name: Mez & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We love to share what we have, to give others a chance to have the life we have!
lenders.occupational_info: A work in progress, always!

lenders.name: Oceans of Opportunity
lenders.loan_because: Working in some of the most remote corners of the planet, I have a selfless appreciation for the numerous hardworking individuals and families that are not reached by  westernized resources, including access to capital. I believe that it is a our social responsibility, as visitors, environmentalists, and explorers of these areas to support the local economies and developing infrastructure by any means possible. The investment potential of these areas provides opportunities at a microscale which is often not realistic in more developed economies, yet is no less profitable; all while doing good for communities and economies in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an environmental, ocean, and exploration advocate undertaking numerous microventures to develop our grassroots organization, Ocean Opportunity.

lenders.name: Tammie
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the difficult situation of others.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with the opportunity to help. This idea is simply fantastic
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm blessed with an exciting job in which I meet all kind of people every day.

lenders.loan_because: I've worked on remittances and microfinance for years in multilateral institutions and I think it is amazing to also be able to loan directly.

lenders.name: Jean-Paul
lenders.occupation: School Teacher & Executive Director for OPAES
lenders.loan_because:
OPAES: Oasis Project Africa Education Society
OPAES is a non-profit organization without affiliation to government or religious organizations. 100% of donations to OPAES are used for its programs in Africa. Funds needed for administrative costs, such as postage, brochures, communication and so on are raised by the OPAES Board by other means and son on

OBJECTIVES:
OPAES objectives for the Mulungano project are:
7.	To sponsor women’s community based programs such as growing food and animal banking
8.	To assist women with funds for small business and family income projects
lenders.occupational_info:
GOALS
OPAES goals for the Mulungano micro loan project are:
1.	Our goal is to sponsor 500 women for the micro loan project or cooperative project. Each woman will receive $50 to start her business. At the end of the month each recipient will donated back $2 to sponsor other programs.
2.	The income from 200 women will be able to support the running of the elementary school 
3.	The income from 300 women will be able to support the running of the vocational school (2009project.)   
$8 women have been spornsored so far by OPAES. 402 women are waiting to be sponsored. Toal cost $20,100.
Please let us know how many people you would like to sponsor.

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.name: Elise

lenders.name: Ingvar
lenders.loan_because:
IN ENGLISH: Because it contributes to emancipation, independence and a better life.
EN ESPAÑOL: Porque contribuye a emancipación, independencia y una vida mejor.
EN FRANÇAIS: Parce qu'il contribue à émancipation, indépendance et une vie meilleure.

IN ENGLISH: I lend money because this allows the hard work of the entrepreneur to give better income and a better life. However, unfortunately there are also risks. I know of these risks from my own experience: Years ago I was trapped in a debt that was too large, too difficult to pay, and it was awful. So please be careful! I really hope that you won't have any problems, and that this will work out very well for you. I sincerely hope that this becomes a step toward economic independence and a better life!

EN ESPAÑOL: Presto dinero porque esto permite que el trabajo tan duro del empresario dé ingresos mejores y una vida mejor. Sin embargo, lamentablemente también hay riesgos. Conozco a estos riesgos de mi propia experiencia: Hace años estaba atrapado en una deuda demasiado grande, demasiado difícil de pagar, y era terrible. Por tanto, ¡por favor tengan cuidado! Verdaderamente espero que no tendrán problemas, y que todo les irá muy bien. ¡Sinceramente espero que esto será un paso hacia independencia económica y una vida mejor!

EN FRANÇAIS: Je prête de l'argent parce que ça permet que le travaille si dur de l'entrepreneur donne plus de revenu et une vie meilleure. Cependant, malheureusement il y a aussi des risques. Je connais ces risques d'expérience propre: Il y a quelques années, j'étais piégé d'une dette trop grande, trop difficile de payer, et c'était terrible. Pourtant soyez prudentes s'il vous plaît! Vraiment j'espère que vous n'aurez pas des problèmes, et que tout ira très bien. Sincèrement j'espère que ceci sera un pas vers indépendance économique et une vie meilleure!
.
lenders.occupational_info:
IN ENGLISH: School teacher and computer programmer.
EN ESPAÑOL: Profesor de escuela y programador de computadores.
EN FRANÇAIS: Professeur des écoles et programmeur des ordinateurs.

IN ENGLISH: Through the years I've had several different occupations. I've been a substitute teacher in different schools in my home city of Stockholm. They would call me on the telephone when a teacher was ill and they wanted me to come and teach the children. I've also been an office worker and computer programmer for the main organization for the international language Esperanto (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanto). This was in their main office in Rotterdam, Netherlands. I've also been a computer programmer and website programmer for two companies in Stockholm.

EN ESPAÑOL: A través de los años he tenido varios trabajos distintos. He sido profesor de sustitución en varias escuelas en mi ciudad Estocolmo. Me llamaron por teléfono cuando un profesor estaba enfermo y querían que yo viniera a enseñar a los niños. También he sido trabajador de oficina y programador de computador para la organización principal del idioma internacional Esperanto (http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanto). Esto fue en la oficina principal en Rotterdam, Países Bajos. También he sido programador de computador y programador de páginas Web en dos empresas en Estocolmo.

EN FRANÇAIS: Au cours des années j'ai eu des professions diverses. J'ai été professeur remplaçant dans diverses écoles dans ma ville Stockholm. On m'a appélé par téléphone quand un professeur était malade et on voulait que je vienne enseigner aux enfants. Aussi j'ai été travailleur de bureau et programmeur d'ordinateur pour l'organisation principal pour la langue international Espéranto (http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Espéranto). Ça c'était dans leur bureau principal à Rotterdam, Pays-Bas. Aussi j'ai été programmeur d'ordinateur et programmeur des pages de Web dans deux entreprises à Stockholm.

lenders.name: Steve&Jen
lenders.loan_because: This is such a small and easy way to try and help others in parts of the world we will probably never get to visit.
lenders.occupational_info:
Steve - I create maps and information for people in the town of Banff, Alberta, Canada.

Jen - I help to heal tired and aching muscles in a professional clinical atmosphere.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed that I have the resources and the ability to help others. I think that helping others help themselves is one of the best ways to do good in the world. Thanks, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent IT consultant specializing in the implementation of Oracle Product Information Management Data Hub (PIMDH).

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I have been intrigued by the concept that people are not poor because they do not want to work, rather most often people are poor due to their lack of access to capitol.  I have an entrepreneurial spirit and have a vision to grow my own business so that the fruit of its growth can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Mission is to be the exclusive provider of innovative storage solutions for people who lead active but want organized lifestyles. We want our customers to love our products. We offer our customers a unique product that not only serves their storage needs; we offer an attractive and hip alternative to plastic grocery bags.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world!

lenders.occupational_info: I make crafts that help people in their prayer life.  When people buy my work, I tell them I am using the money to fund loans for people through Kiva.

lenders.loan_because: There are times when we all need a helping hand.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because:
I just heard about microfinancing and I immediately loved the approach. 
Financing is not something related only to big banks and companies. 
Everyone can be involved. 
Everyone matters.
lenders.occupational_info: My job consist in the analysis and development of computer software projects.

lenders.name: Reynoir
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a little bit better.

lenders.name: SittingBoo

lenders.name: Denise

lenders.occupational_info: I lead teams to build computer systems for a company that provides phone, television and internet services.

lenders.name: Jorunn
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to get involved in the world.

lenders.name: Anthony

lenders.occupational_info: Hardware and camping sales.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I've lived on that side of the tracks where no one will help you at all, not even your own family. I wouldn't wish that feeling on anyone. So i do my best to help out those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am many things. My regular job is a radiographer for the military. After work i am a photographer.

lenders.name: samuel

lenders.occupational_info: The  business is nice  pays  well  and creates job opportunities in the communities

lenders.name: howard
lenders.loan_because: receipt  of small payments  has ,perhaps, helped all of at some time  in our lives ...may we make them to  others  whilst we can
lenders.occupational_info: developing  rural  collaborative communities

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: Imagine the global impact if each person with the ability to do so perpetually renewed even one Kiva microloan of $25.00. What is worth very little in one place may make a critical difference elsewhere. If you are reading this, chances are you can make a microloan of $25.00. Do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I design and hand fabricate jewellery using ancient and modern techniques. I also write poetry and fiction.

lenders.name: Robert & Amber
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because it makes sense. We have been lucky enough to receive loans when we needed help, so we would like to pay that forward. We have always wanted to make an impact in life. Now we can, one loan at a time!

Kiva borrowers helping Kiva borrowers! We are proud to say that each new loan we are currently participating in is being funded by repayments from Kiva borrowers.
lenders.occupational_info: Robert helps bars and restaurants promote their businesses and Amber works for attorneys that handle business lawsuits.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
well...

 I like to travel and I saw a lot of povertry 
I know by myself how dificult it is to raise money  to start up own busines. That is the reason I kiva to help people.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I find the Asian people to be fantastic entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: diana
lenders.loan_because: When I was in the Peace Corps I saw what an impact small business ventures could make on family.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Tracye
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people start or maintain their business.

lenders.name: David & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to change the world's poverty.  We who have enough should give and lend to those who need more.
lenders.occupational_info: I equip & supply Physical Therapy and Cardiac Rehab departments in Hospitals, and Private practices with all equipment and supplies needed to treat patients.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I hope that it will make a difference in other people's lives

lenders.name: Marjan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping people to maximise their talents and opportunities by supporting their own efforts and plans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for all accounting and logistics (export) tasks within a new and inspiring company.

lenders.name: Nadine
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who need just a little bit of help to achieve better living conditions.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people of different cultures and languages talk to each other.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I like to hear their stories and enjoy helping people and their families.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's so important to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students.

lenders.name: SYD
lenders.loan_because: Of the love of Jesus Christ for me. I am motatived to love and help those I have never met because he loved me first.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell engineered equipment to electric utilities.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a donation that will keep coming back to me over and over again -- so that I can help multiple individuals benefit. Plus, it's nice to think that I am helping make someone's life a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a variety of skills. Mostly though, I'm concentrated in three areas: Education, Writing, and Library Science. At this time, I'm working in a data entry department for a local law enforcement agency. Though not traditional library work, it still has to do with the flow and distribution of information - which I find very interesting.

lenders.name: Joost
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: As a project manager, during the day, I help companies with thousands of employees make changes to their computers. At night, as an Imrovisor, I used to perform as an actor in a comedy show to entertain people and I still do so sometimes.

lenders.name: Suresh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this type of philanthropy where you teach a man to fish rather than hand outs. This may be the light at the end of the tunnel that we have all been waiting for.
lenders.occupational_info: Right use of technology and philanthropy for betterment of man kind irrespective of race,class,caste, creed or geography. We are all one.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from nursing home work as Activity Director.  Before that I worked for Girl Scouts of USA as Adult Educator.

lenders.name: Robin

lenders.name: Jana
lenders.loan_because: I can use the same money over and over to help those in need.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It's not fair that people that are nice  can't make a living so they are poor.
lenders.occupational_info: My school is a good place to get an edjucation.

lenders.occupational_info: I protect my clients' assets and help them get their businesses up and running after a loss.

"Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it."
Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.occupational_info: I work with women entrepreneurs to uncover their soul's passion and learn online marketing to get known, find their customers and make more money.

lenders.occupation: study, play games, read and practice violin
lenders.loan_because: we know that there are a lot of kids out there that don't have the same opportunity to go to school like we do.  We want to change their family"s lives for the better so they can became whatever they want. Like we can!
lenders.occupational_info: We are striving to make the world better. It's a big job but we know we can do it! With your help we can reach across the world in no time!

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes we are in a position to be able to give - it benefits everyone to do so. Sometimes we are in a position where we need help. This is life and we should embrace it!
lenders.occupational_info: I work to promote the safety of children in Canada.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: it is one of the simplest and most effective methods to help the people in the world that need the most help.

lenders.name: Sallyanne
lenders.loan_because: I used personal loans for graduate school.  Now I contribute proactively in my community every school day.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher.   I teach in a very diverse community.  There are over 72 languages spoken in our schools.  Many of our families are immigrants or refugees.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: ... I can. Kiva helps make the world seem somewhat smaller by providing opportunities to interact with people from so many distant and diverse countries. Making a loan is a small and manageable contibution in the fight against 3rd world poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Foremost, I am member of a great family, a father of a wonderful daughter and a former child welfare professional.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that would have helped me.

lenders.occupational_info: I help to promote agricultural biodiversity.

lenders.loan_because: "As a weapon against poverty in developing countries, microcredit is as vital as education, health, human rights and good government." -- A Billion Bootstraps

lenders.name: Rachelle
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: i have always wanted to help people realize their own potential in their lives through entrepreneurship.  i respect all people who have ideas and dreams that they wish to see come about for the betterment of themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: i have studied plants in college and have worked for many years doing landscape designs for people who wish to create a beautiful outside environment around their homes and places of business.  i live in a challenging climate for growing plants--it is often too hot, too cold, too wet or too dry. my job requires a great deal of plant knowledge to be successful!

lenders.name: Mélanie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think this is, for now, the best way I have found to help and give back.

lenders.name: Sue

lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds for a non-profit hospice that cares for terminally ill people in Northwest Florida and lower Alabama regardless of their ability to pay for the care/

lenders.name: Amanda

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed and fortunate in my life. I have many wonderful friends and family members who have given me help when I needed it. I want to help other hard working people succeed.

I design and make costumes and clothing, often from recycled materials like used clothing. My two grandmothers taught me how to sew when I was very young, and I love to make clothes, as well as think of new designs. 

.

lenders.occupational_info: I handle huge amounts of money each day. It comes from people who don't know enough to do something productive with it. So they waste it on gambling. I'm not proud of what I do, but it pays the bills.

I know how hard it is to find and keep a job there.  I am honored to be a part of Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I monitor the Security and Access for a system called SAP.  I make sure that the proper people are  are using the  system

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and believe that Kiva is a strong, safe, and interesting way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Bob

I live in a country that has so much to offer, even the poorest of people aren't really poor compared to other countries, and if I can make a little difference in someones life then that's a good thing :)
lenders.occupational_info: I clean at a hospital. It is interesting work :)

We make a living by what we get, 
but we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Edgar
lenders.loan_because: I care and believe in compassionate capitalism.

lenders.name: Matt and Katie

lenders.name: Robert

I have a "normal" job as a claims adjuster but spend the majority of my time working on an education resource website IBEC. Here is our mission statement if you are interested: 
"Recognizing the immense value of education, wide-spread obstacles to its accessibility, and the collaborative potential of the Internet, IBEC was created to give everyone with Internet access a place to teach and learn."

lenders.loan_because: sometimes we all need a little help to make our lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve drinks and food, and help provide comfort to people traveling on airplanes.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: ...because I want to empower people to hopefully in turn lend to someone else one day. I want to help women around the world become successful on their own terms.  I really believe that micro-loans provide opportunities that may not have ever been possible before.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with designing, implementing and improving systems at a telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.occupational_info: long hours, heavy tools, dirty oily equipment. and a very dangerous place to work.

lenders.name: Annalisa and Daniel

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea that may do some good.

lenders.name: Christopher

lenders.name: Tarheel Nutrition

lenders.name: Caity
lenders.loan_because: "the art of being kind is all this world needs."

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: This can be a piece of the puzzle to give others a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Student at Tulane University

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lenders.name: Speleostalker
lenders.loan_because: It' s nice to contribute implementing people dreams.

lenders.occupational_info: I provide safety, comfort, and service on an airplane.

lenders.name: David

I add anything from monsters to cities, from skys to explosions to a shot so that the final image looks athough it was filmed all at once and in a real situation.

lenders.loan_because: I like to help those people who are helping themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I provide dog walking, pet minding and pet transportation services.

lenders.loan_because: we want to help
